item.description: This will be a fun night to end the work week and meet new people.  They have delicious food and a great atmosphere.  Come join us for a fun evening!  You buy your own dinner.  To reserve, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 32 Cooke Street:  I‑84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 2 (Rt. 372), end of ramp turn left onto New Britain Avenue, at next light turn right onto Cooke Street, facility on right.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Dinner Evening
